TestDescription.name: Ext JS arbitrary file read
TestDescription.Description: Ext JS is a pure JavaScript application framework for building interactive web applications using techniques such as Ajax, DHTML and DOM scripting. Baidu Security Team found a vulnerability in the examples provided with Ext JS that allows an attacker to initiate arbitrary HTTP requests and (in some conditions) read arbitrary files from the server.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker can initiate arbitrary HTTP requests and (in some conditions) read arbitrary files from the server.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Restrict access to the examples directory provided with Ext JS.
